Package game

Class Crop

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Crop
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
public class Crop
extends Item
Crops that start of as unripe and once it ripes it can be harvested by humans/the player
Author:
Joseph Yu

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Crop​(java.lang.String name)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void fertilizeCrop()
    Method for outside classes to fertilize the crop object, which increases the age of the crop and removes the fertilize action once the crop is ripe.
    boolean getIsRipe()
    Method for outside classes to determine whether a crop around them is ready to be harvested or not.
    void setIsRipe​(boolean isRipe)
    Method for outside classes to change the class variable isRipe.
    void tick​(Location location)
    Calls the super's tick function and checks if the age is greater than or equals to 20 and if so, change displayChar and setIsRipe to true.

    Methods inherited from class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item

    addCapability, asWeapon, getAllowableActions, getDisplayChar, getDropAction, getPickUpAction, hasCapability, removeCapability, tick, toString

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ItemInterface

    asCrop, asFood, craft, isHasIt

  • Constructor Details

    • Crop

      public Crop​(java.lang.String name)

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      Calls the super's tick function and checks if the age is greater than or equals to 20 and if so, change displayChar and setIsRipe to true.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • getIsRipe

      public boolean getIsRipe()
      Method for outside classes to determine whether a crop around them is ready to be harvested or not.
      Returns:
      isRipe boolean variable that lets outside classes know if the crop object is ripe or not.

    • setIsRipe

      public void setIsRipe​(boolean isRipe)
      Method for outside classes to change the class variable isRipe.
      Parameters:
      isRipe - boolean variable that represent whether the crop object is ripe or not.

    • fertilizeCrop

      public void fertilizeCrop()
      Method for outside classes to fertilize the crop object, which increases the age of the crop and removes the fertilize action once the crop is ripe.
